item.title: By: Jake Howlett
item.dc:creator: Jake Howlett
item.description: <p>Another one gets the bug! I caught it off Mike Golding. Seen his site? www.mgolding.com - great stuff on there!</p><p>Keep at it Matt. You will get better and better if you keep practicing. Looking back to January when I started doing it "seriously" and I am almost embarrassed by shots like this:</p><p><a href="http://www.jakehowlett.com/gallery/archive/20.html" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.jakehowlett.com/gallery/archive/20.html</a></p><p>Jake</p>
item.content:encoded:
Another one gets the bug! I caught it off Mike Golding. Seen his site? http://www.mgolding.com/ – great stuff on there!

Keep at it Matt. You will get better and better if you keep practicing. Looking back to January when I started doing it “seriously” and I am almost embarrassed by shots like this:

http://www.jakehowlett.com/gallery/archive/20.html

Jake
